name: Working Hours and Rest Periods Policy

fields.label: Policy Statement
fields.description: Ensures working hours, rest, and overtime practices comply with the BCEA and Sectoral Determination 13 while protecting young workers.

fields.label: Scope
fields.description: Applies to all employees, including full-time, part-time, temporary, and under-18 workers.

fields.label: Working Hours
options: No night or Sunday shifts for young workers
Flexible hours permitted within legal limits

fields.label: Rest Periods
options: Young workers get a 30-min meal break

fields.label: Compliance and Monitoring
options: Employees can report issues to supervisor/safety officer

fields.label: Review and Updates
fields.description: Reviewed annually for alignment with labor laws and company needs.
